DOC.brief_summary: The importance of Aldosterone for endothelial function and Insulin resistance observed within patients with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Aldosterone in Circulatory Disorders Within Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed diabetic < 5 Yrs. BMI < 32 kg/m2 Nonsmoking Blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg (treatment with maximum of two antihypertensive drugs) Insulin treatment Hypertension (>140/90 mmHg) Sequelae to diabetes Smoking Known chronic diseases Pregnancy or birth within 3 month Alcohol misuse
